bill_title: Commending and honoring the Parker State Class B Boys' Cross Country Champions.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Commending and honoring the Parker State Class B Boys' Cross Country Champions. WHEREAS, the Parker team consisting of cross country runners seniors Matt Mielke, Seth Olson, and Trevor Miller; junior Duane Jongeling; and sophomores Michael Olson and Ryan Olson; and WHEREAS, Duane Jongeling placed first in the State Class B Cross Country Meet held at Yankton Trail Park in Sioux Falls on October 22, 2011; and WHEREAS, Coach Phil Bjorneberg was named South Dakota Boys' Cross Country Coach of the Year by the South Dakota High School Coaches Association (SDHSCA): NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eighty-seventh Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that congratulations be given to the Parker State Class B Boys' Cross Country Champions and coach Phil Bjorneberg on a great season.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Commending and honoring the Parker State Class B Boys' Cross Country Champions. WHEREAS, the Parker team consisting of cross country runners seniors Matt Mielke, Seth Olson, and Trevor Miller; junior Duane Jongeling; and sophomores Michael Olson and Ryan Olson; and WHEREAS, Duane Jongeling placed first in the State Class B Cross Country Meet held at Yankton Trail Park in Sioux Falls on October 22, 2011; and WHEREAS, Coach Phil Bjorneberg was named South Dakota Boys' Cross Country Coach of the Year by the South Dakota High School Coaches Association (SDHSCA): NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Eighty-seventh Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that congratulations be given to the Parker State Class B Boys' Cross Country Champions and coach Phil Bjorneberg on a great season. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
